articles.description: Forces of the Philippines and Japan over the weekend held the second bilateral maritime cooperative activity (MCA), following the ratification of Reciprocal Access Agreement (RAA) that the two countries inked in July 2024.
articles.content:

articles.title: Israeli attacks secret Houthi meeting site in Yemen
articles.description: Houthi security forces quickly cordoned off the house
articles.content:
